title: Instructional Design Strategies for Improving Online Lecture Design Quality

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Online course design competency enhancement program for graduate students in elementary education

learning_goals: It can describe an online course design framework aligned with national standards (e.g., iNACOL, Quality Matters)
It can create a syllabus with alignment between learning objectives, content, and assessments
It can design inclusive learning materials reflecting diverse learner needs (cultural, accessibility, multimodal engagement)
It can construct an online learning environment ensuring user experience consistency
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
